abstract: Ames Scullin O’Haire, Atlanta, was named by the Coca-Cola Company, Atlanta, to create a campaign for Seagram’s ginger ale as Coca-Cola significantly expands distribution for Seagram’s beverages.
snippet: Ames Scullin O’Haire, Atlanta, was named by the Coca-Cola Company, Atlanta, to create a campaign for Seagram’s ginger ale as Coca-Cola significantly expands distribution for Seagram’s beverages.
lead_paragraph: Ames Scullin O’Haire, Atlanta, was named by the Coca-Cola Company, Atlanta, to create a campaign for Seagram’s ginger ale as Coca-Cola significantly expands distribution for the full line of Seagram’s beverages. Spending was not disclosed. The line also includes products like seltzer and tonic water.

headline.main: Accounts and People of Note in the Ad Industry
